exec.Strong: Hey {name}, I hope you've been doing well! I wanted to reach out to see if you'd be interested in exploring potential collaboration opportunities. I think your role as {role} at {company} aligns perfectly with what we're working on. Let me know if you'd like to chat further!

exec.Weak: Hi {name}, I noticed your role as {role} at {company}, and I thought it might be interesting to explore collaboration opportunities. Let me know if you'd like to connect!

non-exec.Strong: Hi {name}, it's been a while since we last spoke! I wanted to reach out and catch up on your recent work at {company}. I'm sure there might be some ways we could collaborate in the future.
non-exec.Moderate: Hi {name}, I noticed your role as {role} at {company}, and I think we might have some shared interests. I'd love to connect and learn more about what you're working on!
non-exec.Weak: Hi {name}, I came across your profile and was impressed by your work at {company}. I'd love to connect and explore any opportunities to collaborate in the future!
